body: get_signature_epochs get_signature_epochs(items:List[Any], total_epochs:int, mode:Union[str, NoneType]=None) -> List[int] Find all epochs of changes due to schedulers. Args: items : List of items to scan from. total_epochs : The maximum epoch number to consider when searching for signature epochs. mode : Current execution mode. If None, all execution modes will be considered. Returns: The epoch numbers of changes.
title: get_signature_epochs
